name: 高等影像處理
description: 本課程含蓋高階的影像處理相關研究及應用技術的介紹與探討.專注在理論及計算技術的發展並提供重要技術詳細的演算法.
goals: Build theoretical concepts of image processing
Focus on computational techniques for 2D and 3D images
Provide detailed algorithmic and theoretical treatments
syllabus:
【授課方式：16週】

本課程介紹數位影像處理的相關技術，包括影像強化、影像平滑化、雜訊過濾、 Fourier轉換、影像分割、邊緣偵測、特徵擷取等技術的說明與介紹。搭配程式作業的要求，期望學生能了解並實作各種影像處理技術。

課程內容如下: 

Week 1: [Chapter 0 Introduction to Image Processing](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283374)

Week 2: [Chapter 1 Introduction](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283375)

Week 3: [Chapter 2 The image, its representations and properties](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283376)

Week 4: [Chapter 3 The image, its mathematical and physical background (I)](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283377)

Week 5: [Chapter 3 The image, its mathematical and physical background (II)](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283378)

Week 6: [Chapter 3 The image, its mathematical and physical background (III)](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283379)

Week 7: [Chapter 4 Data structure for image analysis](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283380)

Week 8: Midterm exam

Week 9: [Chapter 5 Image pre-processing (I)](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283381)

Week 10: [Chapter 5 Image pre-processing (II)](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283382)

Week 11: [Chapter 5 Image pre-processing (III)](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283383)

Week 12: [Chapter 6 Segmentation I (I)](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283384)

Week 13: [Chapter 6 Segmentation I (II](https://moodle3.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/resource/view.php?id=283385))

Week 14: Final exam

Week 15: Final report and presentation (I)

Week 16: Final report and presentation (II)

本課程每堂上課前皆有測驗，上課請勿遟到，且所有作業皆為程式作業，另期末視需要上台DEMO與報告(或錄製DEMO與報告影片)。

教科書:Image processing Analysis, and Machine Vision, 4th edition, Milan Sonka, Vaclav Hlavac, Roger Boyle, Cengage Learning, 2015.
